title: assertion failure in rustc
body:
Hi,

Just triggered an assertion failure with this code:

``` rust
use std::num::FloatMath;

fn main() {
    FloatMath::sin(18.0f64);
}
```

Which gives:

```
error: internal compiler error: unexpected failure
note: the compiler hit an unexpected failure path. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
task 'rustc' failed at 'assertion failed: `(left == right) && (right == left)` (left: `1`, right: `0`)', /home/blastrock/packages/rust/src/librustc/middle/trans/callee.rs:528

stack backtrace:
   1:     0x7ff95c46aa80 - rt::backtrace::imp::write::hbe5a5bcc01f62aea0Kq
```
